query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(permit_approval_date) AS month, COUNT(*) AS count, permit_status, permit_zipcode, applicant GROUP BY permit_status, permit_zipcode, applicant, month ORDER BY month, permit_status, permit_zipcode, applicant

month.description: Month and year of permit approval

permit_status.description: Current status of the permit (Approved, Requested)

applicant.description: Name of person or company to which the permit is issued

table_metadata.title: Wireless Service Facility Permits
table_metadata.description: All active and closed wireless service facility permits issued by Public Works.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: Commercial mobile service companies, telecommunications policymakers, city planners

whom_it_may_interest: Commercial mobile service companies, telecommunications policymakers, city planners
title: Wireless Service Facility Permits
